description: {"blocks":[{"key":"aufdn","text":"This SOP describes the procedure for generating cDNA from SARS-CoV-2 viral nucleic acid extracts and subsequently producing 400nt amplicons tiling the viral genome using V4.1 nCov-2019 primers (ARTIC) in multiplex PCR. Illumina-compatible sequencing libraries are then made directly from these amplicons in a second PCR step, obviating the need for conventional library preparation. The products of these PCRs are then equivolume pooled and quantitated, prior to sequencing on the Illumina NovaSeq.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4a9pb","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtm0b","text":"It is an adaptation of the COVID-19 ARTIC v3 amplicon protocol which can be found here:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kles","text":"https://www.protocols.io/view/covid-19-artic-v3-illumina-library-construction-an-bibtkann","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":89}],"data":{}},{"key":"cpj4a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1h5cm","text":"Both the above protocols were adapted from the nCov-2019 sequencing protocol: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"27aeo","text":"https://www.protocols.io/view/ncov-2019-sequencing-protocol-bbmuik6w","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":68}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"5E1E4EF31E8711EB875B0A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/covid-19-artic-v3-illumina-library-construction-an-bibtkann"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"ED831B9E1E8611EB875B0A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/ncov-2019-sequencing-protocol-bbmuik6w"}}}}

in the multiplex pool. In reality this is not achievable, and the fraction of reads observed for each amplicon varies widely.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"n3dj","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7bbda","text":"The ratio [actual observed read fraction/‘ideal’ read fraction] can be calculated for each individual amplicon, as indicated by the differently-coloured dots on the box-and-whisker plots below.
